TopicTitle: New planes and a buggy! (BluPlanet Inc)

Articles.Content:
Devoted engineer Ace of Spades spent two hours yesterday designing some new crafts for the company!

First off, the Ca-49, a big beast which packs quite a punch (bonus: free missiles! Isn't that a great deal?):

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/x608mge7c5sgnxu/Plane%20CA-49.craft

Next, the Mig-21(?) aircraft, based off the Russian plane, made for target practice (therefore hard to fly, warranty void if flown, but hey who said there was warranty in the first place):

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/a167jcrmpf48pe4/Plane%20Mig-21.craft

Now, the F-4. Based off the real one, it is a tribute to the wise and brave, those who were wounded or killed in war:

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/nlcl8az2y75btgg/Plane%20F-4.craft

Finally, here is the DB-1, an all terrain buggy that's fun to play with:

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/8q8684bogmywhb4/Rover%20DB-1.craft

Thanks Ace of spades!

Ace of Spades-

Ever thought about building a Do-x?

What the hell is that

-Ace
